message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I can only pay up to $95 for it. Let me know if this works for you!
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go lower than $98.  This product is worth more than that to me, and I think it's still a great value for you.  Let's split the difference!
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I can only afford to pay up to $96 for the product. I hope this meets in the middle for us both.
